title: Mx Claus Medium Skin Tone
description: A person dressed as Santa Claus, representing a gender-neutral interpretation of the holiday figure. This emoji signifies the spirit of giving, festive cheer, and inclusivity during the holiday season.
apple_vendor_description: This festive Mx.
